api_list.name: BMP
api_list.description:
Aka BMP sensor gen endpoint, android only.
Supports Nike/Adidas App/Confirmed (3.4.4/3.2.3)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aka-bmp.p.rapidapi.com/bmp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aka-bmp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aka-bmp.p.rapidapi.com/bmp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aka-bmp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
